abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column describes feeling sense of deja vu while reporting on accusations of brutal hazing and sexual assault of football player at Conestoga High School in Chestery County, Pa; notes case is but one of many similar incidents across country; suggests best way to prevent such attacks is to make sure adults are present and accountable.
lead_paragraph: The district attorney investigating the latest hazing case in high school sports says all coaches need to be present and proactive in fighting these brutal sports rituals.

headline.main: Something Is Missing in High School Hazing Stories: Adults
headline.print_headline: Something Is Missing in Hazing Stories: Adults

snippet: The district attorney investigating the latest hazing case in high school sports says all coaches need to be present and proactive in fighting these brutal sports rituals.
